hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'rm\s+-(r|f|rf|fr)\s'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Recursive/force delete not allowed. Use targeted rm instead.' >&2; exit 2; fi
if echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git\s+push.*\b(main|master)\b'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Direct push to main/master. Use a feature branch.' >&2; exit 2; fi

FILE=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); case "$FILE" in *.env|*.env.*|*credentials*|*secret*|*.pem|*.key) echo "BLOCKED: Cannot edit sensitive file: $FILE" >&2; exit 2;; */pnpm-lock.yaml|*/package-lock.json|*/yarn.lock|*/uv.lock) echo "BLOCKED: Cannot edit lock file: $FILE" >&2; exit 2;; esac

FILE=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); case "$FILE" in *.env|*.env.*|*credentials*|*secret*|*.pem|*.key) echo "BLOCKED: Cannot write sensitive file: $FILE" >&2; exit 2;; */pnpm-lock.yaml|*/package-lock.json|*/yarn.lock|*/uv.lock) echo "BLOCKED: Cannot write lock file: $FILE" >&2; exit 2;; esac
